AB_TITLE: Junk Science Jeopardy and Science-Phobic Judges: Zantac on Re
AB_CONTENT: Scientific evidence for Zantac causation has previously been reviewed by Judge Robin Rosenberg in Flarida. Now ostensibly using the same Daubert analysis but misunderstanding its precepts, Judge Vivian Medinilla of Delaware reaches an opposite result. This paper identifies the pitfalls into which she falls.
